H0.text: Barney the Owl is a mascot of which English football club. Sheffield United

H1.text: Barney the Owl is a mascot of which English football club. Newcastle United

H2.text: Barney the Owl is a mascot of which English football club. Manchester City

H3.text: Barney the Owl is a mascot of which English football club. The Owls

A4.text: The current mascots are Ozzie and Barney Owl.

A5.text: All three were replaced in 2006 by Barney Owl.
